TextView.android:text: The world is warming and although the Paris Agreement aims to limit global warming to well below 2°C, faith in the world’s leaders to deliver on these promises is rice paper thin. The stark reality is that by 2060 the world could be 3-6°C warmer. This means more cataclysmic weather events – both in terms of violence and frequency.
